attributes.additional_details: Dementia and Alzheimer diseases have now become the new medical scourge.  We believe the PM should immediately scrap all existing Overseas Aid promises and funds and divert those funds to an immediate and law-backed NHS programme of scientific and medical investigation leading to new diagnostic and curative/preventative measures together with new British technology to identify and, eventually, cure these awful medical complaints that eventually kill without a known cure and are increasingly a huge expense to the NHS.
